text: 5.9-10: Hi 2.10; 5.6; 11.40Mba tɨv ana muuŋgim, ana guigira fhara guarara buni mbararagi guma ki. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, ana buni zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi, ana mben kurkurav, taagia mbe ndi. Ana mba ndi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe zazera mbara muuŋgip kɨrga. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Fhe Bakɨme ana farasarav ana nzuav, khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu Merkisedek Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari guman pan kegi farar muuŋgirga.”
